s_synopsis: We're in the future and gates to the alternate universe "Dark Moon" have blown open across the face of the Earth. It seems that the wicked Titonia Empire is involved. Creatures unknown to this world, the ''Beasts'', emerge through the gates; and as though in the name of nature's oldest necessity, they fall upon the human race mercilessly. It's time to hit the deck as one of the 4 heroes and mow down 9 levels of beasts and imperial forces on a mission to end the Dark Moon threat.
